name: Down Fall
description:
Join the discord and contribute to my development process!
https://discord.gg/UrtFevZg

Through rigorous selection have you been chosen for the unique opportunity to inhabit your own vessel and partake in a tournament run since the beginning of time as you know it. This challenge will test your ability to overcome the very ebb and flow of gravity itself against other, similar beings of worthiness. Will you master the forces around you to prove your metal, ascending to heights never reached by a single soul, or will you succumb to the crushing nature of this reality and enter into… Down Fall

Features


    The vertical BR
    UE5 one of the first to do it
    Up to 50 player
    Procedural generated maps
    Randomized weather system
    Day night cycle
    Destructible maps
    Open mic

Say hello to your Vessel
